item.description:
Here is the link for Northwest Park.

Assuming good weather, we'll hang out from early afternoon until dusk.  Plenty of open space to play, plenty to see and do for the youngsters including a playground, a nature center, and a barn with a variety of farm animals (explore the website for details). 

FYI... no alcohol allowed in the park.  Consider it a family-friendly day of fun and sun.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for picnic tables out past the playground area.

group.name: Connecticut & Western Mass Asatru Meetup Group

item.name: Kubbmoot
